attributes.action: review of the conditions of the breeding licence, forced vaccination for lepto
attributes.background: The new breeding licence is forcing breeders to vaccinate our dogs with the lepto vaccine even though there is mountains of research and proof that it’s an dangerous vaccine with little to no relevant cover

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about recent press reports that the lepto vaccine may harm dogs, however we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to fund research into possible side effects of the lepto vaccine if that is something you would like to see happen.
